oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Spatial variation in the localization of Danish organic farms
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Frederiksen, Pia
Langer, Vibeke
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Denmark
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Conversion to organic farming shows a large variation at the county level in Denmark. This is attributed to proximity to urban markets and values, regional specialization of farm types and municipal promotion of organic farming. However, also at the local level there is a substantial variation in the localization of organic farms. This may be related to negative influences of social barriers and positive influences of fiery souls among producers and advisors.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Frederiksen, Pia and Langer, Vibeke (2004) Spatial variation in the localization of Danish organic farms. DARCOFenews (2).
